mapper.select: CREATE TABLE INVESTING ( createTime timestamp, stock VARCHAR(20), current int, high int, low int, changePrice int, changeRate FLOAT, tradingVolume BIGINT, tradeTime VARCHAR(10) );
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO INVESTING ( createTime, stock, current, high, low, changePrice, changeRate, tradingVolume, tradeTime ) VALUES
( left(now(),16), #{item.stock}, #{item.current}, #{item.high}, #{item.low}, #{item.changePrice}, #{item.changeRate}, #{item.tradingVolume}, #{item.tradeTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE INVESTING a, ( SELECT changeRate, tradingVolume, `current`, INVESTING.stock, DATE_ADD(INVESTING.createTime, INTERVAL +#{interval} DAY) as createTime FROM INVESTING ) b SET a.bf1d_changeRate = round(b.changeRate,2), a.bf1d_tradingVolume = b.tradingVolume, a.bf1d_current = b.`current`, a.bf1d_tradingVolumeRate = round(a.tradingVolume / b.tradingVolume * 100,2), a.bf1d_currentRate = round(a.`current` / b.`current` * 100,2) WHERE a.stock = b.stock AND a.createTime = b.createTime AND a.createTime = (select max(createTime) from INVESTING);
